response.overview: A group of self-absorbed actors set out to make the most expensive war film ever. After ballooning costs force the studio to cancel the movie, the frustrated director refuses to stop shooting, leading his cast into the jungles of Southeast Asia, where they encounter real bad guys.
response.title: Tropic Thunder

titles.title: Tropic Thunder - Hol Dir die volle Dröhnung!

cast.name: Anthony Ruivivar
cast.character: Platoon Sergeant Shot in Head - Hot LZ
